hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn Umar that the Messenger of Allah(ﷺ) said:"If there comes to you a man who is respected among his own people, then honor him

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا أَتَاكُمْ كَرِيمُ قَوْمٍ فَأَكْرِمُوهُ
chapter.eng-name: If a man who is repspected comes to you, then honor him
